Patient 36: Patient 36 is a 62-year-old male with a history of hypertension and hyperlipidemia. He is currently taking lisinopril and atorvastatin to manage these conditions. His medical history includes a myocardial infarction five years ago, and he has been stable since then. There is a family history of cardiovascular disease, with his father having passed away from a heart attack at the age of 70. He has no known drug allergies.
